metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000487 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Plexus-utils before 3.0.16 is vulnerable to command injection because itdoes not correctly process the contents of double quoted strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplexus-utils-java - 1:1.5.15-5
No subscription required

libplexus-utils2-java - 3.0.22-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: plexus-utils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.5.15-5').
plexus-utils2 package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.22-1').
